description: Advanced law enforcement technology platform for U.S. police departments featuring community engagement, anonymous tip reporting, emergency response coordination, data integration, and CJIS-compliant security
features: Anonymous tip submission with multi-channel support
Public crime reporting and citizen input
Emergency response coordination and manhunt mode
Data integration with criminal databases (NCIC, state systems)
Mobile access for officers and citizens
Comprehensive admin panel for law enforcement customization
Predictive analytics and crime pattern analysis

publicAlerts.title: Community Meeting Tonight

publicAlerts.title: New Community Resources Available
publicAlerts.content: We've added new legal aid resources and community support services.
